metadata.Title: CVE-2010-3703 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The PostScriptFunction::PostScriptFunction function in poppler/Function.cc in the PDF parser in poppler 0.8.7 and possibly other versions up to 0.15.1, and possibly other products, allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a PDF file that triggers an uninitialized pointer dereference.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> only affect poppler versions after b1d4efb082

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.0-0ubuntu2').
